item.title:
Strengthening the APAC Cloud Ecosystem for 2026 ğŸŒâ˜ï¸
At Finda Cloud, we believe that strong technolo...
item.description: Strengthening the APAC Cloud Ecosystem for 2026 ğŸŒâ˜ï¸ At Finda Cloud, we believe that strong technology is built on even stronger relationships. As we wrap up a dynamic 2025, our VP - Asia, Victor Leung and Regional Business Development Director, Kelvin Cheung, has been on the ground visiting our key vendor partners across Singapore, Malaysia, and Taiwan. These face-to-face sessions are vital. They allow us to align on roadmaps, understand local market nuances, and ensure our distribution strategy is ready for the next wave of cloud innovation. The feedback from our partners has been clear: the region is ready for growth. We are bringing back exciting new strategies to support our channel network. The foundation is set. Stay tuned for a massive 2026! hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #APAC hashtag #CloudDistribution hashtag #TechPartnerships hashtag #Singapore hashtag #Malaysia hashtag #Taiwan hashtag #2026Ready Freshworks Acronis ESTHA NTT DATA KDDI Corporation Rogue Asia Infoline Tec Group Berhad SIFT Analytics Group TAC LEGACY SDN BHD GlobalSign zoustec èŒæ€ç§‘æŠ€ LEYUN æ¨‚é›²æ™ºèƒ½ æ­ç±³è‹±æ³° Omni Intelligent Services æˆ´åšæ–¯ç§‘æŠ€è‚¡ä»½æœ‰é™å…¬å¸ DevOps Tec Deloitte Radware CloudMile Master Concept Group

If you're looking to future-proof your tech stack and network with industry leaders, this is the place to be. ğŸ—“ï¸ Date: Friday, January 9, 2026 â° Time: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm ğŸ“ Location: Grand Ballroom, Sheraton Hong Kong Hotel & Towers We can't wait to see you there! item.title: A strong week in Manila at the GlobalSign APAC Partner Summit â€” and an even stronger milestone for F...
item.description: A strong week in Manila at the GlobalSign APAC Partner Summit â€” and an even stronger milestone for Finda Cloud. Proud to share that Finda Cloud Technology Limited has been awarded the Master Reseller Recognition for Territorial Expansion Excellence as a New Partner. This award reflects what matters most to us: driving pipeline, expanding market reach, and accelerating revenue with our vendor and channel ecosystem across APAC. Our partnership with GlobalSign is growing fast â€” strong demand, clear customer wins, and solid momentum in key markets. With our sales engine, regional presence, and fulfilment capability, weâ€™re ready to take this collaboration to the next level. Big thanks to the GlobalSign APAC team for the trust and for an impactful summit in Manila. Letâ€™s keep building, closing, and scaling together. ğŸš€ hashtag #Sales hashtag #APAC hashtag #GlobalSign hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #ChannelSales hashtag #Growth hashtag #SaaSDistribution hashtag #Partnerships Tan J.

item.title: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's A...
item.description: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack
item.content:encoded: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack

item.title: What an incredible experience at Zoom Zoomtopia Partner Connect Asia in Singapore! This trip has bee...
item.description: What an incredible experience at Zoom Zoomtopia Partner Connect Asia in Singapore! This trip has been truly amazing and profoundly meaningful for me. It was fantastic to join the event and connect with so many brilliant minds in the reseller community. A massive thank you to Stephen Liu, Jacob Pereira, Vishal Amin, Weishin Tee and John Kao for making this trip such a success! Your support and partnership are invaluable. It was also a pleasure meeting Manish Sharma, Smile Huang, Gerald Tan, Gary Yeo, Priyanka Chandramouli, Nuno Pereira, Eric Lam, Raysen Chan , Yanko Dzhukev, Perry... and so many other wonderful partners Kyocera Document Solutions Singapore Pte Ltd, DYXnet, We+ Asia, ARCONIS LTD, ESTHA, Freshworks, SIFT Analytics Group... Building these relationships is key, and we are excited about the prospect of continuing to build more and more businesses with all of you. Here's to a future of collaboration and success! ğŸ¤ Victor Leung Finda Cloud Technology hashtag #Zoomtopia hashtag #PartnerConnect hashtag #Singapore hashtag #Partnership hashtag #BusinessGrowth hashtag #Reseller hashtag #Zoom hashtag #Findacloud hashtag #Kyocera hashtag #Freshworks hashtag #Estha hashtag #Distributor
